extensionDescription.message: Extract transcripts from YouTube Watch Later videos in bulk for research and note-taking.

extractTranscripts.description: Button text for extracting transcripts from videos

selectVideos.description: Instruction to select videos for transcript extraction

copyToClipboard.description: Button text to copy transcripts to clipboard

downloadAsMarkdown.description: Button text to download transcripts as markdown file

transcriptExtracted.description: Success message when transcript is extracted

noTranscriptAvailable.description: Error message when no transcript is available
noTranscriptAvailable.message: No transcript available for this video

watchLaterOnly.description: Message shown when extension is only available on Watch Later playlist
watchLaterOnly.message: This extension only works on YouTube's Watch Later playlist
